overview:
Trevor McGuire is the president of SingSnap Karaoke.

Trevor McGuire holds an Electronics Engineering Technician degree from Algonquin College and an MBA from the University of Ottawa.

Trevor McGuire’s work experience includes seven years at Corel. During his tenure the company’s revenues grew dramatically from US$7M to $200M.

Using Tune 1000 products and services as a base Trevor McGuire developed Karaoke software and developed a web based property aimed at consumers. It is from these early developments that Trevor McGuire has created SingSnap Karaoke!
